article: iranian president mahmoud ahmadinejad was sworn in for a second term on wednesday , vowing more defiance of the west at a ceremony boycotted by his rivals , as police in full riot gear broke up protests by opposition demonstrators .
abstract: defiant ahmadinejad sworn in as police break up protests
